briefTitle: Peanut Oral Immunotherapy Study of Early Intervention for Desensitization
officialTitle: Peanut Oral Immunotherapy Study of Early Intervention for Desensitization (POSEIDON)

interventions.name: AR101 powder provided in capsules & sachets
Placebo powder provided in capsules & sachets

arms.label: AR101 powder provided in capsules & sachets
Placebo powder provided in capsules & sachets

summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the efficacy and safety of AR101 in peanut-allergic children aged 1 to \< 4 years.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Subjects Who Tolerated a Single Highest Dose of at Least 600 mg in the Exit Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Food Challenge (DBPCFC)
